attributes.action: Bring back original Recipe Irn Bru , new low sugar recipe is awful!
attributes.background: Irn Bru makers AG Barr recently cut the sugar content in regular Irn Bru by around 50% in response to the Goverments new Sugar Tax . This has left Irn Bru fans disgusted as the new recipe is awful , We as people are aware of what we are putting in are bodies and should have the right to choose!

rejection.details:
If you'd like a change to the Soft Drinks Industry Levy (often known as the "sugar tax), you could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

You can find out more here:

https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/soft-drinks-industry-levy/soft-drinks-industry-levy
